Razor Claw looked out of the CR chamber in awe as he smiled. "You know the
rules of war, There are no rules so you beat me fairly." Without the symbol
to remind him he no longer fealt the link with the war. "If we're not here
to fight this war then why was I created?"

Veratis stepped forward to answer the question. "We're here to save our
race." he checked the settings for any viral output, not finding any he
stepped away. "When you're out you, Lunarpine and Ice will attend class.
Hopefully then you will understand the prophecy."

Foxfingers looked to Lunarpine and Ice, "Thanks for the save back there, I'm
not sure what would've happened if you two hadn't stepped in."

Lunarpine answered quickly and sarcastically, "Didn't have much of a choice
Fox, it was either bail you out or pick you up piece by piece." he laughed
when he said that and Foxfingers turned in a huffy manner and stomped out
like a tantrumed child.


----- Original Message -----
From: <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, November 23, 2000 9:01 AM
Subject: Re: Trouble in the lab


> Ice::
>
> She broke off and stopped holding him. She was breathing hard and
> sweating under her fur.  The drain from her energy supply made her
> feel light headed. She watched Razor Claw go into the CR. She stepped
> closer to it as he called to her. She smiled. "Thank you. And I'm
> sorry for biting you. I didn't want to hurt you. But, I had to do
> something. I couldn't let the others get hurt either. Welcome to our
> group."
>
> She moved over to her corner and sat down in polarbear mode. She was
> feeling exhausted.
>
>
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > (If I haven't already I'll send you info on Razor Claw.)
> >
> > Razor claw transformed back to robot mode, his shoulder dripping
> > blood. "What have you done to me?" he asked when he realized that
> he
> > wasn't dripping mech fluid.
> >
> > "You are part of a new breed of translife form." Veratis
> transformed
> > back to robot mode and started bandaging the wound. " You are more
> > organic than any bot on this planet with the exception of Ice."
> > Foxfingers activated the clean up drones to take care of the mess.
> > Veratis placed a cutter on Razor Claws chest and removed the
> Predacon
> > symbol.
> >
> > "AAAGH" The pain went through Razor Claw as the symbol was removed.
> > He stumbled backwards ready to fall.
> >
> > Lunarpine caught him under the arm and led him to the CR chamber.
> > Razor Claw volentarily stepped in and the door closed. Veratis
> smiled
> > as he looked in at the latest addition to thier group.
> >
> > Razor Claw called for Ice to come closer. "I heard your name during
> > the fight, Ice, It suits you well." he stared out at the prototype
> > for his kind and smiled.
> >
> > (Got to go, Dinners in an hour and I have Potatos to finish.)
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > > (Yeah you did. Thanks)
> > >
> > > Ice::
> > > She kept him pinned against the wall. She didn't want him to hurt

> > feeling
> > > drained, but didn't want to take any riskes untill Veratis had
> one
> > > him over. She was starting to sweat under her fur. This was
> taking
> > > more out of her than she had planned on.
> > >
> > >
> > > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > > > Razor Claw left his feat and his shield dissapaited, he again
> hit
> > > the
> > > > wall with a thud. "What weapon is this?" His confusion was
> > matched
> > > > only by his inability to move.
> > > >
> > > > Lunarpine knew that she couldn't keep this up forever so he
> > decided
> > > > to end the fight. He charged forward and put his claws to the
> > > > Raptor. "You can let him go now, he's not going anywhere."
> > > >
> > > > Razorclaw was pinned and without his feat to ground him he
> > couldn't
> > > > activate his shield. "Ganging up on me? I thought Maximals
> fought
> > > > fair." he stared at Lunarpine hoping for the chance to escape.
> > > >
> > > > "To bad we aint your average maximal." Lunarpine stared right
> > back
> > > at
> > > > him, The Raptor knew he wasn't kidding and looked away. "You
> win,
> > > I'm
> > > > your prisoner." The Predacon thought he was a POW, he didn't
> know
> > > > that Veratis wasn't part of the war.
> > > >
> > > > Veratis stepped forward, "Let him down Lunarpine, He's not
> > > > responsible for his actions." Lunarpine let go and stepped
> > > aside. "I
> > > > think I have some explaining to do." He started his origin
> speech
> > > and
> > > > Razor Claw listened.
> > > >
> > > > (Did I send you information on Veratis, Foxfingers, and Lady
> Hawk
> > > > yet?)
> > > >

> > > > >
> > > > > She entered into Razar Claw's mind and saw him put up his
> > > shields.
> > > > > She still could use her abilities against him. She changed
> into
> > > > > griffen mode without realizing it. She concentrated and
> pushed
> > > him
> > > > > against the wall with her mind.  She would hold him there and
> > not
> > > > let
> > > > > him go.
> > > > >
> > > > >

> > > > > > (His robot arms are his beast legs, His shoulders flip
> around
> > > to
> > > > > > become his thighs resulting in the catapult jump he used.)
> > > > > >
> > > > > > Razor Claw put up an invisible shield to protect himself
> from
> > > her
> > > > > > pecks. He remained still, waiting to see what Ice did next.
> > > > > >
> > > > > > Lunarpine saw the break in the action and took advantage.
> He
> > > > > > transformed to his half wolf stage and dashed into the
> > battle.
> > > > > > Foxfingers rolled out and began scampering toward

> > > > > > Lunarpine grabbed the fox and pulled him to safety.
